gobblin.data.management.conversion.hive.avro

Class AvroSchemaManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.conversion.hive.avro.AvroSchemaManager

  • public class AvroSchemaManager
extends Object
    Avro schema for a Partition or Table is available at multiple locations. This class is used to decide the schema to use. It also creates a temporary schema file on the FileSystem.
      1. The Schema can be set as a literal in the serde info
      2. The Schema url can set as a property in the serde info
      3. The Schema can be inferred using the physical data location of the Table or Partition
    Callers request for the schema url using getSchemaUrl(Partition) or getSchemaUrl(Table).
      In case (1.), the literal is written as a Schema file under schemaDir. The Path to this file is uses as the Schema url
      In case (2.), the url itself is used as the Schema url
      In case (3.), a Schema file is created under schemaDir for Schema of latest data file.
    In all three cases the mapping of Schema to temporary Schema file path is cached. If multiple Partitions have the same Schema a duplicate schema file in not created. Already existing Schema url for this Schema is used.
